entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 800 metres. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
